 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָבַע‎</span>] **verb** ==lie stretched out, lie down== (Aramaic form of  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָבַץ‎</span> (q. v.); Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רבע‎</span> usually of copulation, chiefly unnatural; yet compare also Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רבע‎</span> ***abide, encamp, settle***, [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>ZMG xxix (1875), 593</sup>, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***abide, dwell***) — 

**Qal** only ***Infinitive:*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִבְעִי‎</span> [[Ps.139.3|Ps 139:3]] ***my lying down*** (for repose, opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָרְחִי‎</span>); elsewhere ([[BDB#H|H]]) for copulation (woman with beast) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְרִבְעָה אֹתָהּ‎</span> [[Lev.20.16|Lev 20:16]], but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִתָּהּ‎</span> (suffix of beast) [[BDB#Dr-Wh|Dr-Wh]] [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>Synt. 226 e</sup>, compare [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] [[BDB#Berthol|Berthol]] (and [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>[[2Sam.13.14|2Sam 13:14]]</sup>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְרִבְעָהּ‎</span> [[2Sam.18.23|2Sam 18:23]], read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְרִבְעָה‎</span> (compl. omitted; see ***id.***). **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּהֶמְתְּךָ לֹא תַרְבִּיעַ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּלְאַיִם‎</span> [[Lev.19.19|Lev 19:19]] ([[BDB#H|H]]) ***thy cattle thou shalt not cause to*** (let) ***lie down*** (i.e. breed) in ***two kinds.***
